title: Economic Systems and Market Analysis

vocab.definition: Economic system combining elements of capitalism and socialism
Measure of responsiveness of quantity demanded to price changes
Costs or benefits affecting third parties not involved in transaction
Situation where free market fails to allocate resources efficiently
Central bank actions to control money supply and interest rates

teachingNotes: Analyze market mechanisms and government interventions. Discuss economic indicators and policy tools.

sample.question: What economic system combines capitalism and socialism?

truefalse.question: Externalities affect only the parties directly involved in transactions.

multiplechoice.question: What measures responsiveness of demand to price changes?

shortanswer.question: How does market failure justify government intervention?
